mutants.code:
import string

def find_lexemes(sentence, start):
    words = ['MUTATED'.join([char for char in word if char not in string.punctuation]) for word in sentence.split()]
    result = [word for word in words if word.startswith(start)]
    return result

import string

def find_lexemes(sentence, start):
    words = [''.join([char for char in word if char in string.punctuation]) for word in sentence.split()]
    result = [word for word in words if word.startswith(start)]
    return result
